defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:applications
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:applications

Install, repair, or uninstall applications on an EC2 instance. This plugin only runs on Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:configureDocker
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:configureDocker

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Configure an instance to work with containers and Docker. This plugin is supported on Linux and Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:configurePackage
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:configurePackage

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Install or uninstall a Distributor package. You can install the latest version, default version, or a version of the package you specify. Packages provided by AWS are also supported. This plugin runs on Windows Server and Linux operating systems, but not all the available packages are supported on Linux operating systems.

Available AWS packages for Windows Server include the following: AWSPVDriver, AWSNVMe, AwsEnaNetworkDriver, AwsVssComponents, AmazonCloudWatchAgent, and AWSSupport-EC2Rescue.

Available AWS packages for Linux operating systems include the following: AmazonCloudWatchAgent and AWSSupport-EC2Rescue.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:domainJoin
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:domainJoin

Join an EC2 instance to a domain. This plugin only runs on Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:downloadContent
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:downloadContent

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Download SSM documents and scripts from remote locations. This plugin is supported on Linux and Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:psModule
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:psModule

Install PowerShell modules on an EC2 instance. This plugin only runs on Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:updateAgent
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:updateAgent

Update the EC2Config service to the latest version or specify an older version. This plugin only runs on Microsoft Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:updateSsmAgent
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:updateSsmAgent

Update the SSM Agent to the latest version or specify an older version. This plugin runs on Linux and Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:softwareInventory
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:softwareInventory

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Gather metadata about applications, files, and configurations on your managed instances. This plugin runs on Linux and Microsoft Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:runShellScript
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:runShellScript

Run Linux shell scripts or specify the path to a script to run. This plugin only runs on Linux operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:runPowerShellScript
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:runPowerShellScript

Run PowerShell scripts or specify the path to a script to run. This plugin runs on Microsoft Windows Server and Linux operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:runDocument
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:runDocument

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Runs SSM documents stored in Systems Manager or on a local share. You can use this plugin with the aws:downloadContent plugin to download an SSM document from a remote location to a local share, and then run it. This plugin is supported on Linux and Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:runDockerAction
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:runDockerAction

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Run Docker actions on containers. This plugin runs on Linux and Microsoft Windows Server operating systems.

defaultSnippets.label: Snippet: aws:refreshAssociation
defaultSnippets.description:
Insert snippet for aws:refreshAssociation

(Schema version 2.0 or later) Refresh (force apply) an association on demand. This action will change the system state based on what is defined in the selected association or all associations bound to the targets. This plugin runs on Linux and Microsoft Windows Server operating systems.
